/bin/cc   -g -O2 -Wall -pthread -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -D_GNU_SOURCE -fvisibility=hidden    CMakeFiles/test_libhdfs_zerocopy_hdfs_static.dir/__/libhdfs-tests/expect.c.o CMakeFiles/test_libhdfs_zerocopy_hdfs_static.dir/__/libhdfs-tests/test_libhdfs_zerocopy.c.o  -o test_libhdfs_zerocopy_hdfs_static -rdynamic ../../../native/target/usr/local/lib/libhdfs.a ../libhdfs-tests/libnative_mini_dfs.a /home/hadoop/software/jdk1.8.0_191/jre/lib/amd64/server/libjvm.so -ldl -Wl,-rpath,/home/hadoop/software/jdk1.8.0_191/jre/lib/amd64/server
